title: Sushiana
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Ovo, Chinese, Japanese, Thai, Take-out, Catering, Delivey, Non-veg
description: Serves fish, veg options available. Vegetarian and fish/pescatarian, Kosher, dairy-free restaurant offering Pan-Asian fare. Many dishes are made with mock chicken and mock beef, and offers vegan sushi. Kitchen uses a separate deep fryer for the veggie items. The menu beyond sushi is 70% vegetarian, and many dishes are or can be made vegan. Opens Saturday night approx. 1.5 hour after sunset.
